# American invasion

American invasion may refer to:
Military
* 1983 United States invasion of Grenada
* 1989 United States invasion of Panama
* 2001 United States invasion of Afghanistan
* 2003 invasion of Iraq
Science fiction
* Invasion America
* Invasion America (board wargame)
* Invasion (American TV series); see
See also
* List of wars involving the United States
